comment: I definitely recommend taking Elizabeth Wile! She is a wonderful teacher and very clear in her lectures and explanations. She is approachable (even during quizzes and tests) and truly wants her students to succeed. She gives as much possible credit on tests as she can with partial credit for answers. Definitely take her if you can!

I loved this class with her. She made everything easy to understand, and was very willing to help if you were struggling. A lot of quizzes and tests but you are allowed a note sheet for each. ALEKS homework but unlimited attempts and she gives a lot of time to do them. If you need this class, TAKE HER!

Prof Wile is amazing. She explained everything very well and provided enough online material to study for the tests. She was also very patient when answering students' questions. We were allowed a notecard on every quiz and half a paper on the tests.

I consider myself a math person so take what I have to say with a grain of salt, but I would recommend her as a teacher. Class is very important as you learn stuff every single day. If you show up and lock in for the amounted time, you will do good.There is a good bit of online homework too. She allows half of a notecard for tests.

This course was super easy. Pay attention in class and take good notes, complete the aleks homework and you will get great grades on tests. She allows a HALF-A PAGE for a 'notecard' on both quizzes and tests. she teaches very well and will go over something multiple times in different ways to make sure you get it. great teacher.
